description: Leading projects as a Technical Anchor, responsible for the complete architecture, creation, and deployment of component libraries. Proficient in Adobe Experience Manager (AEM) and Micro Frontend (MFE) applications, driving innovation and technical excellence.

Served as a frontend developer, managing full project lifecycles and implementing automated testing with Cypress and Jest. Specialized in platform hardening, quality assurance, and delivering high-quality, scalable solutions.

Worked as a frontend and UI/UX developer, gaining expertise in modern web technologies. Contributed to multiple projects, collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver user-centric solutions and enhance product quality.
